name: CANDY MOUNTAIN
description: Candy Mountain is a housing developer.
sampleDescriptions: Assist and advise in communications with the BLM and Congress in the acquisition of a 160 acre parcel of BLM property for the purposes of creating housing and a conservation project.
NAT: (there may be a better or additional category to use) Assist in communication with BLM for the purchase of land to be used for a housing and wildlife conservation project.
